text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: The device used measuring the visual acuity.

purpose.value: This Device resource represents the VisualAcuityMeasurementDevice concept (NL-CM:12.19.6) of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) VisualAcuity v1.0 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/VisualAcuity-v1.0(2020EN)).

definition.value: The device used measuring the visual acuity.
